dsc.util.data.list_contains_type(values: Iterable[Any], test_type: type, require_non_empty: bool = False) → bool

Determine if a list contains the given type.

Parameters

  • values – list or numpy array to test

  • test_type – python type to test

  • require_non_empty – True: empty list returns False, False: empty list returns True (default)

Returns

boolean

  • end_date – range end date

  • freq – frequency of range (default is daily: ‘D’)

class dsc.util.db.RunQuery(engine: Engine)

Bases: object

Wrapper to run a SQL from pandas so that the engine is encapsulated.

This is to alleviate constantly passing in the engine. For Example:

engine = create_engine("sqlite://")
run_sql = RunQuery(engine)
df1 = run_sql("select 1 as foo")
df2 = run_sql("select 2 as foo")
exception dsc.util.error.DatabaseError

Bases: RuntimeError

dsc.util.str.list_to_sql_str(values: List[Any]) → str
